title: How to report bots in ARAM?
body: Just played an aram game, with a miss fortune that was clearly a bot. She basicaly ran it down mid all game, not responding whatsoever. I went to report her, but found no option to do so.

replies.body: If you find another player acting strange or causing a negative experience, please submit a report after the game.  You will find a reporting option next to their summoner name at the post-game screen.  You may select the category that you feel is best, but it would be especially helpful to write down any additional information you might have in the text field box.  Thanks for helping to keep the community safe!
There really should be a 'Bot' option when reporting accounts. I see quite a few when i play below level 30 games with a friend of mind.

I usually put it down the "Cheating" and/or "Intentional Feeding" categories.

Using a bot is considering cheating to me, at least. It's the closet actual option.

Totally this. I am kind of okay with it.. makes games pop quicker in my region but i understand how it can be really irritating in SR games as i have had that issue.. and friends who think they are amazing by destroying bots but don't know they are bots.
